name: Resolve Event
description: Attempt to resolve an ongoing event modifier affecting your kingdom
selectionPrompt: Select an ongoing event to resolve

effects.successMsg: The ongoing event has been successfully resolved!
effects.criticalSuccessMsg: The ongoing event has been resolved with exceptional success!
effects.failureMsg: Failed to resolve the ongoing event. It continues to affect your kingdom.
effects.criticalFailureMsg: Your attempt to resolve the event has made things worse!

notes: This action allows you to attempt to resolve ongoing modifiers from unresolved events. The available skills and DC depend on the specific modifier you're trying to resolve.
